ModMetaData.name: Teleporter Room
ModMetaData.author: HopeSeekr
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.0 The BetterRimworlds Teleporter Room enables the teleportation of any Pawns and Things inside the teleport room instantaneously, anywhere on the planet.
A fully-functional Atlantean Teleporter Room: Teleports pawns and things anywhere in the world!
